name: myinfopedia
0:
”Alexa launch my info pedia”
”Alexa store sun rises in the east in my info pedia”
”Alexa ask my info pedia to forget everything”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my info pedia
des:
You can store any type of information and retrieve it later.
To store your information, you will have to say Alexa store INFORMATION in my info pedia

To retrieve your information, you will have to say Alexa find SOME RELEVANT DETAIL ABOUT THAT INFORMATION in my info pedia

For example :
You want to store "Sun rises in the East",
You will have to say Alexa store Sun rises in the East in my info pedia

To retrieve the same information,
You will have to say Alexa find sun in my info pedia
